title: Zion Williamson, Antonio Brown, Kyrei Irving and Charles Barkley
itunes:title: Zion Williamson, Antonio Brown, Kyrei Irving and Charles Barkley
description:
Filling in for Colin, Doug Gottlieb discusses Charles Barkley’s latest comments, Duke F Zion Williamson, the drama surrounding Pittsburgh Steelers wide receiver Antonio Brown, and Boston Celtics G Kyrie Irving’s disdain for the media. Guest include Matt Barnes, and Michael Rapaport.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
